page.title: 15A POLICEMAN'S DAY
page.content: P.C.Hayward came to talk to us about the police force and what they do and how they do it.P.C.Hayward has 1 stud on his shoulder to show that he is a constable.A sergeant has 3 stripes on his arm ,an inspector has 2 studs,a chief inspector has 3 studs and a superintendant has a crown. A policeman has to have a truncheon and handcuffs just in case things get out of hand. Policemen don't always put people in jail they help lost people. Policemen can have cars,motorbikes or bicycles. A policemans day is sometimes busy and sometimes not.He picks up reports of crimes on his radio.He puts down car numbers.He goes for walks or rides on his bicycle to check everything is alright.Some police are women.
